name: Programming Practices in C++
body:
#Programming Practices Using C++ Lab
##IT-594F, 2016

###By Aurghyadip Kundu

###Contents

#####Assignment 1
Basic C++ Syntaxes and Function calls.

#####Assignment 2
Dynamic Memory Allocation and Function overloading.

#####Assignment 3
Constructors and Copy Constructors

#####Assignment 4
The concept of Inheritance &polymorphism. Virtual Base Classes in C++ and Virtual Functions.

#####Assignment 5
Concept of Operator Overloading in C++.

#####Assignment 6 & Assignment 7
Exception handling in C++.

#####Assignment 8
Template functions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
